name: 曾德樟
objective:
1.Introduction and review
2.Baseband data transmission
3.Digital band-pass modulation techniques
4.Random signals and noise
5.Noise in digital modulation
6.OFDM transmission
7.Spread sprectrum communication
schedule:
CH1: Introduction and review (第 1-2 週)
1.The applications of communication systems
2.Primary resources and operational requirements
3.Theories of communication systems

CH2: Baseband data transmission (第 3-5 週)
1.Baseband transmission of digital data
2.The Intersymbol interference (ISI) problem
3.The Nyquist channel and the raised-cosine pulse spectrum

CH3: Digital band-pass modulation techniques (第 6-8) 週)
1.Introduction
2.Some preliminaries
3.Binary Amplitude-Shift Keying (ASK)
4.Phase-Shift Keying (PSK)
5.Frequency-Shift Keying (FSK)
6.Noncoherent digital modulation schemes
7.M-ary digital modulation schemes
8.Mapping of digitally modulated waveforms onto constellations of signal point

CH4: Random signals and noise (第 9-11 週)
1.Probability and random variables
2.Expectation
3.Random processes
4.Spectra of random signals
5.Linear systems and random processes
6.White noise and narrowband noise

CH5: Noise in digital communications (第 11-14 週)
1.Bit error rate (BER)
2.Detection of a signal pulse in noise
3.Optimum detection of binary PAM in noise
4.Optimum detection of BPSK
5.Detection of QPSK and QAM in noise
6.Optimum detection of binary FSK
7.Differential detection in noise
8.Error detection and correction

CH7: OFDM transmission (第 14-16 週)
1.Basic principles of OFDM
2.OFDM implementation using IFFT/FFT processing
3.Selection of basic OFDM parameters

CH7: Spread spectrum communications (第 16-17 週)
1.Pseudo-noise sequences
2.A notion of spread spectrum
3.Direct-sequence spread spectrum (DSSS) with coherent BPSK
4.Frequency-hop spread spectrum (FHSS)

(第 18 週 期末考)
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考
2. 期末考
3. 作業
4. 小考
5. 出席率
materials:
1. S. Haykin and M. Moher, “Introduction to Analog & Digital communications 2/E,” 2007 (歐亞圖書代理)
2. 中譯本 (高立圖書代理)
consultation: 可透過 E-mail 或諮詢時間或課餘時間。
remarks: 若因疫情而實施遠距教學時，將使用 MS Teams 視訊上課，會議網址將公告於北科 i 學園 PLUS。
